ygData.subject: Electrum bracers -ooc
ygData.msgSnippet: I just picked up a pair of electrum bracers from a talented little gnome jeweler and have a question....The stats on this are +10 mana, +10 health, 2 ac per
ygData.messageBody:
I just picked up a pair of electrum bracers from a talented little gnome
jeweler and have a question....The stats on this are +10 mana, +10 health,
2 ac per bracer (just incase I mislabeled it)...It seems to me that since
getting these that my mana has been regenerating much faster than before.
I used to lag further and further behind the wizard I travel with when we
were recuperating after a battle but now I can start from less and come
out ahead of him (I am a shaman). Did I conjure some super rations or has
someone else noticed this when wearing them? I'm about 4 pixels away from
a new level, so there was no new learning or levels involved and as I now
have more mana it should seem even slower...

I dunno....just curious if anyone appeared to have noticed the same thing.


Terrek Clouddancer
Erollisi Marr
